alert.note: Alert for Coastal Pender; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pender County through 500 PM EDT... At 414 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a small cluster of strong thunderstorms between Burgaw and White Stocking, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, Surf City, Topsail Beach, White Stocking, Maple Hill, Murray Town, Ashton, Topsail, Woodside, Edgecomb, Rocky Point, St. Helena and Pender Memorial Hospital. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 393 and 408. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
